metadata.title: CVE-2020-13649 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: parser/js/js-scanner.c in JerryScript 2.2.0 mishandles errors duringcertain out-of-memory conditions, as demonstrated by ascanner_reverse_info_list NULL pointer dereference and a scanner_scan_allassertion failure.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
